entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
